mapper.insert: insert into member_addr( member_addr_no, member_name_extra, member_addr_post, member_addr_basic, member_addr_extra, member_addr_status, member_no ) values( member_addr_seq.nextval, #{member_name_extra}, #{member_addr_post}, #{member_addr_basic}, #{member_addr_extra}, '기본주소', #{member_no} )
mapper.select: select * from member_addr where member_no = #{member_no} order by member_addr_no asc
